strings.string: [COLOR=sublabel-text][UPPERCASE]Skin developer: Jeroen[CR][CR][/UPPERCASE][/COLOR] [UPPERCASE][B]Thanks:[/B][/UPPERCASE] Team-XBMC, all plugin, script and skin developers and anyone contributing in whatever way to making XBMC so great. And YOU, for using Focus.[CR] [CR][COLOR=sublabel-text]✱[/COLOR] Special thanks to Jonathan Marshall, for his ever so fast and great help.[CR] [CR][COLOR=sublabel-text]✱[/COLOR] This skin uses icons from the Oxygen Icon Theme (www.oxygen-icons.org)[CR] [CR][COLOR=sublabel-text]✱[/COLOR] Default wallpaper created by Adam Moore, used with permission. Visit elusive.deviantart.com for his portfolio.[CR] [CR][COLOR=sublabel-text]✱[/COLOR] Questions or suggestions regarding Focus? Visit the Focus section on the official XBMC forum (www.xbmc.org/forum)[CR] [CR][COLOR=sublabel-text]✱[/COLOR] Compiled Focus builds are available on the google code page (http://code.google.com/p/xbmc-focus/)[CR] [CR][COLOR=sublabel-text]✱[/COLOR] Focus updates are also made available through the XBMC-Favorites Installer plugin. (http://code.google.com/p/xbmc-favorites/)[CR] [CR][COLOR=sublabel-text]✱[/COLOR] You can support development of XBMC by donating hardware or money to Team-XBMC. All donations are shared by the team and are utilizied for financing R+D (www.xbmc.org/contribute/donate)
Fade out background while submenu is open
Highlight the first letter while scrolling
No Plot Info in Fanart View
Bigger Posters in List View (Movies and TV Show Posters)
Display Fanart In Video Info Screens
No Plot Info in Slide View
No Plot Info in Fanart View
No Plot Info in Fanart View (episodes)

Here are a couple of quick tips that are good for you to know: [CR][CR] - On the home screen you can use the direction down buttons to open submenus for every category, providing you quick access to the various sections of XBMC. [CR] - Hitting one of the media categories will always take you into file-mode. The mentioned submenus will take you to various library related functions. [CR] - Opening the shutdown menu will also provide you with a system wide navigation menu which enables you to get quick access to virtually any part of XBMC no matter which screen you are currently in. [CR][CR] Hit the OK button to start using Focus. This message will not reappear after that.
